import React from 'react' const MODAL_STYLE = { position: 'absolute', top: '10%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', backgroundColor: '#fff', padding: '50px', zIndex: '1000', } const OVERLAY_STYLES = { position: 'fixed', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, .7)', zIndex: 1000, } export default function Modal({ open, children, onClose }) { if (!open) return null return ( <>
{children}
) }
